medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after awakening from a nap this afternoon. They include diffuse abdominal pain, back pain, body aches, 'bone discomfort', and chest pain. The patient experienced nausea and vomiting initially with indigested food that became bilious. Symptoms developed shortly after eating clam chowder and included a distended and uncomfortable stomach without severe pain. Tachycardia was present.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hodgkin's disease, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, history of DVT in right arm from PICC, s/p ERCP and stent placement for biliary obstruction due to LAD.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of colon cancer; paternal cousin with multiple myeloma; great grandmother died of gastric cancer.
